name: Duty Combat Shooter
description:
Duty Combat Shooteris one of the best sniper game of the store. It is a real time action game with realistic 3D graphics and animations. Game has amazing war scenes and fronts. You will like this amazing free 3D game.
Features:

-air force bombing support to you.
-a variety of scenarios,
-Intelligent combat system,
-Intelligent guidance system,
-Added a variety of gorgeous Weapons
-A variety of different battle modes
-Perfect interface: a first-person shooter
-3D images and quality sound effect
